params.name: username
params.desc: The Keystore user that controls the account specified in `to`

params.name: password
params.desc: The password of the Keystore user

params.name: to
params.desc: The address of the account the AVAX is sent to. This must be the same as the to

params.name: sourceChain
params.desc: The chainID where the funds are coming from.

name: importAVAX
desc: Send AVAX from an account on the X-Chain to an address on the C-Chain. This transaction must be signed with the key of the account that the AVAX is sent from and which pays the transaction fee. argument in the corresponding call to the X-Chain’s exportAVAX by calling issueTx.
